verses.name: Acts 4:1
verses.text: And as they spake unto the people, the priests, and the captain of the temple, and the Sadducees, came upon them,

verses.name: Acts 4:2
verses.text: Being grieved that they taught the people, and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead.

verses.name: Acts 4:3
verses.text: And they laid hands on them, and put them in hold unto the next day: for it was now eventide.

verses.name: Acts 4:4
verses.text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed; and the number of the men was about five thousand.

verses.name: Acts 4:5
verses.text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that their rulers, and elders, and scribes,
